msg: Bug 6519, use NetAddr::IP::full6 only when available, without bumping up the required version

msg: Added test which authenticates the user via SSL certs.

author: chirino
msg: Populate the security context with the connection's ssl certs if they are available.

author: chirino
msg: renamed KeyManagerAware to KeyAndTrustAware since both keys and trust are typically needed by the transport to do client auth.  Enable client cert checking by default.
